title: ‘It’s a Very Long Way to Nice’: Tadej Pogačar Still Has a Three Week Tour de France to Solve
content:
Pogačar and UAE Emirates ruled the Galibier, but third-week individual strength will determine the true king of Le Tour.

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Very Long Way to Nice’: Tadej Pogačar Still Has a Three Week Tour de France to Solve on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
